bibl.title: Two Copies of a Royal Petition from Kerkeosiris, 163-146 BCE.
bibl.note: P. Tebt. III, 1, 771 is a composite of two fragments. Edits the text of each fragment in its own right as copy 1 and copy 2. - 1. Archival draft of Petesouchos' petition. - 2. Dispatched copy of Petesouchos' petition.
bibl.seg: Jelle Stoop, Two Copies of a Royal Petition from Kerkeosiris, 163-146 BCE.

P. Tebt. III, 1, 771 is a composite of two fragments. Edits the text of each fragment in its own right as copy 1 and copy 2. - 1. Archival draft of Petesouchos' petition. - 2. Dispatched copy of Petesouchos' petition.
